product_name: Moving Comfort Maia Sports Bra - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Engineered for the full-breasted woman, the Moving Comfort Maia Sports Bra offers a higher-profile neckline and underwire motion-reducing coverage, support, and control. Seam-free interior molded cups encapsulate to provide support and shape. Moderate-contour cups give shape, modesty and maximum moisture transfer with a seamless look. Underwire is encased in plush-backed channelling. Back adjustable straps provide a custom fit. Adjustable, custom-fit back closure allows easy on/off. Closeout.
short_description: Engineered for the full-breasted woman, the Moving Comfort Maia Sports Bra offers a higher-profile neckline and underwire motion-reducing coverage, support, and control.
